00012 uint16_t v1290_Read16(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int offset)
00013 {
00014   int   cmode;
00015   mvme_get_dmode(mvme, &cmode);
00016         mvme_set_am(mvme,  V1290_AM);
00017         mvme_set_dmode(mvme, V1290_REG_DW);
00018   uint16_t data = mvme_read_value(mvme, base+offset);
00019         mvme_set_dmode(mvme, cmode);
00020 
00021         return data;
00022 }
00023

00029         mvme_set_dmode(mvme, V1290_BUFF_DW);
00030   uint32_t data = mvme_read_value(mvme, base+offset);
00031 
00032         mvme_set_dmode(mvme, cmode);
00033         return data;

00042   mvme_write_value(mvme, base+offset, value);
00043         mvme_set_dmode(mvme, cmode);
00044 }

00046 /*****************************************************************/
00047 int v1290_DataRead(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint32_t *pdest, int nentry)
00048 {
00049         int status;
00050         mvme_set_am(mvme,  V1290_AM);
00051         mvme_set_dmode(mvme, V1290_BUFF_DW);
00052         mvme_set_blt(mvme, MVME_BLT_BLT32);
00053         status = mvme_read(mvme, pdest, base, sizeof(uint32_t) * nentry);
00054         mvme_set_blt(mvme, MVME_BLT_NONE);
00055         return nentry;
00056     /*
00057       for (i=0 ; i<nentry ; i++) {
00058       if (!v1190_DataReady(mvme, base))
00059       break;
00060       pdest[i] = mvme_read_value(mvme, base);
00061       }
00062       mvme_set_dmode(mvme, cmode);
00063       return i;
00064     */
00065 }
00066 
00067 /*****************************************************************/
00068 int v1290_MicroWrite(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint16_t data)
00069 {
00070   int i;
00071 
00072         mvme_set_am(mvme,  V1290_AM);
00073         mvme_set_dmode(mvme, V1290_REG_DW);
00074   for (i=0; i<1000; i++)
00075   {
00076     uint16_t microHS = mvme_read_value(mvme, base+V1290_MICRO_HND);
00077     if (microHS & V1290_MICRO_WR_OK) {
00078       mvme_write_value(mvme, base+V1290_MICRO, data);
00079       return 1;
00080     }
00081     usleep(1);
00082   }
00083   printf("v1290_MicroWrite: Micro not ready for writing!\n");
00084   return -1;
00085 }
00086 
00087 int v1290_MicroRead(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, const uint32_t base)
00088 {
00089   int i;
00090   int reg=-1;
00091         mvme_set_am(mvme,  V1290_AM);
00092         mvme_set_dmode(mvme, V1290_REG_DW);
00093 
00094   for (i=100; i>0; i--) {
00095     uint16_t  microHS = mvme_read_value(mvme, base+V1290_MICRO_HND);
00096     if (microHS & V1290_MICRO_RD_OK) {
00097       reg = mvme_read_value(mvme, base+V1290_MICRO);
00098 //      printf("i:%d microHS:%d %x\n", i, microHS, reg);
00099       return (reg);
00100     }
00101     usleep(1);
00102   };
00103   return -1;
00104 }
00105 
00106 uint16_t v1290_ReadMicro(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, const uint32_t base, 
00107                 uint16_t opcode)
00108 {
00109   int   cmode, value;
00110   mvme_get_dmode(mvme, &cmode);
00111   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, MVME_DMODE_D16);
00112   value = v1290_MicroWrite(mvme, base, opcode);
00113   value = v1290_MicroRead(mvme, base);
00114   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, cmode);
00115         return (uint16_t) value;
00116 }
00117 
00118 void v1290_WriteMicro(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, 
00119                 uint16_t opcode, uint16_t data)
00120 {
00121   int   cmode, value;
00122   mvme_get_dmode(mvme, &cmode);
00123   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, MVME_DMODE_D16);
00124   value = v1290_MicroWrite(mvme, base, opcode);
00125   value = v1290_MicroWrite(mvme, base, data);
00126   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, cmode);
00127 }

00148 int v1290_AcqModeRead(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base)
00149 {
00150   int   cmode, value;

00152   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, MVME_DMODE_D16);
00153   value = v1290_MicroWrite(mvme, base, V1290_READ_ACQ_MOD_OPCODE);
00154   value = v1290_MicroRead(mvme, base);
00155         printf("AcqMode (0 - cont., 1 - trigger matching): %X\n",value&0x1);

00157         return (value & 0x1);

00161 {
00162   int   cmode, value;

00164   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, MVME_DMODE_D16);

00166         for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i)
00167         {
00168                 value = v1290_MicroRead(mvme, base);
00169                 printf("%x\n", (uint16_t)value);
00170                 *conf++ = (uint16_t)value;
00171         }
00172 
00173   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, cmode);
00174         return 0;

00182 void v1290_SetWindowOffset(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, int16_t offset)
00183 {
00184         uint16_t tmp = abs(offset/25);
00185         if (offset>0)
00186                 tmp += 0xf000;
00187         else
00188                 tmp += 0xf800;
00189         v1290_WriteMicro(mvme, base, V1290_SET_WIN_OFFSET_OPCODE, tmp);
00190 }

00319 void v1290_EnableChannel(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base,uint16_t chn,bool en)
00320 {
00321   int   cmode, value;
00322   mvme_get_dmode(mvme, &cmode);
00323   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, MVME_DMODE_D16);
00324         uint32_t opcode;
00325         if (en)
00326                 opcode = V1290_EN_CHANNEL_OPCODE;
00327         else
00328                 opcode = V1290_DIS_CHANNEL_OPCODE;
00329 
00330         en += chn;
00331   value = v1290_MicroWrite(mvme, base, opcode);
00332   mvme_set_dmode(mvme, cmode);
00333 }

00364 // Regiters
00365 void v1290_ReadControlRegister(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base)
00366 {
00367         uint16_t reg = v1290_Read16(mvme, base, V1290_CONTROL);
00368         printf("Control register: 0x%X\n", V1290_CONTROL);
00369         printf(" - Bus error enable: %d\n", reg & 0x1);
00370         printf(" - Empty event enable: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<3))>>3);
00371         printf(" - Compensation enable: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<5))>>5);
00372         printf(" - Event FIFO enable: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<8))>>8);
00373         /*showbits(reg);*/
00374 }
00375 
00376 void v1290_EnableBusError(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, bool en)
00377 {
00378         uint16_t reg = v1290_Read16(mvme, base, V1290_CONTROL);
00379         if (en)
00380                 v1290_Write16(mvme, base, V1290_CONTROL, reg + 0x1);
00381         else
00382                 v1290_Write16(mvme, base, V1290_CONTROL, reg & 0xfffe);
00383 }
00384 
00385 void v1290_EnableEmptyEvent(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, bool en)
00386 {
00387         uint16_t reg = v1290_Read16(mvme, base, V1290_CONTROL);
00388         if (en)
00389                 v1290_Write16(mvme, base, V1290_CONTROL, reg + (0x1<<3));
00390         else
00391                 v1290_Write16(mvme, base, V1290_CONTROL, reg & (0xfff7));
00392 }
00393 
00394 void v1290_EnableEventFIFO(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, bool en)
00395 {
00396         uint16_t reg = v1290_Read16(mvme, base, V1290_CONTROL);
00397         if (en)
00398                 v1290_Write16(mvme, base, V1290_CONTROL, reg + 0x100);
00399         else
00400                 v1290_Write16(mvme, base, V1290_CONTROL, reg & 0xfeff);
00401 }
00402 
00403 void v1290_ReadStatusRegister(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base)
00404 {
00405         uint16_t reg = v1290_Read16(mvme, base, V1290_STATUS);
00406         printf("Status register: 0x%X\n", V1290_STATUS);
00407         printf(" - Data ready: %d\n", reg & 0x1);
00408         printf(" - Almost full: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<1))>>1);
00409         printf(" - Full: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<2))>>2);
00410         printf(" - Trigger match: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<3))>>3);
00411         printf(" - Header enable: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<4))>>4);
00412         printf(" - Term on: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<5))>>5);
00413         printf(" - Error TDC0: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<6))>>6);
00414         printf(" - Error TDC1: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<7))>>7);
00415         printf(" - Error TDC2: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<8))>>8);
00416         printf(" - Error TDC3: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<9))>>9);
00417         printf(" - Bus error: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<10))>>10);
00418         printf(" - Purged: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<11))>>11);
00419         printf(" - Res 0: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<12))>>12);
00420         printf(" - Res 1: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<13))>>13);
00421         printf(" - Pair: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<14))>>14);
00422         printf(" - Trigger lost: %d\n", (reg & (0x1<<15))>>15);
00423 }

00425 bool v1290_IsDataReady(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base)
00426 {
00427         uint16_t reg = v1290_Read16(mvme, base, V1290_STATUS);
00428         return ((reg & (0x1)));
00429 }

00431 bool v1290_IsAlmostFull(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base)
00432 {
00433         uint16_t reg = v1290_Read16(mvme, base, V1290_STATUS);
00434         return (reg & (0x1<<1))>>1;
00435 }

00437 bool v1290_IsFull(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base)
00438 {
00439         uint16_t reg = v1290_Read16(mvme, base, V1290_STATUS);
00440         return (reg & (0x1<<2))>>2;
00441 }

00491 void v1290_ReadEventFIFO(MVME_INTERFACE *mvme, uint32_t base, uint16_t *dest)
00492 {
00493         uint32_t reg = v1290_Read32(mvme, base, V1290_EVENT_FIFO);

00520 int main()
00521 {
00522         printf("Test program for V1290\n");
00523         MVME_INTERFACE *myvme;
00524         mvme_open(&myvme, 0);
00525 
00526         v1290_ContinuousRead(myvme);
00527         // Finish
00528         mvme_close(myvme);
00529         return 0;
00530 }

00532 void v1290_SetupTrigger(MVME_INTERFACE *myvme)
00533 {
00534         printf("Trigger matching set ...\n");
00535         v1290_TriggerMatchingSet(myvme, V1290N_BASE);
00536         sleep(1);
00537         v1290_SetWindowWidth(myvme, V1290N_BASE, 40000);
00538         sleep(1);
00539         v1290_SetWindowOffset(myvme, V1290N_BASE, -10000);
00540         sleep(1);
00541         v1290_SetExtraMargin(myvme, V1290N_BASE, 0x9);
00542         sleep(1);
00543         v1290_SetRejectMargin(myvme, V1290N_BASE, 0x8);
00544         sleep(1);
00545         v1290_EnableTriggerSubtraction(myvme, V1290N_BASE, true);
00546         sleep(1);
00547         v1290_AcqModeRead(myvme, V1290N_BASE);
00548         sleep(1);
00549         uint16_t trg_conf[5];
00550         v1290_TriggerConfRead(myvme, V1290N_BASE, trg_conf);
00551 }
00552 void v1290_SetupTDC(MVME_INTERFACE *myvme)
00553 {
00554         printf("Setting TDC ...\n");
00555         v1290_SetEdgeDetection(myvme, V1290N_BASE, 0x1);
00556         sleep(1);
00557         v1290_SetEdgeResolution(myvme, V1290N_BASE, 0x1);
00558         sleep(1);
00559         printf("Edge: %d\n",v1290_ReadEdgeDetection(myvme, V1290N_BASE) );
00560         sleep(1);
00561         printf("Res: %d\n",v1290_ReadEdgeResolution(myvme, V1290N_BASE) );
00562         sleep(2);
00563         v1290_SetDeadtime(myvme, V1290N_BASE, 0x2);
00564         sleep(1);
00565         printf("Deadtime: %d\n",v1290_ReadDeadtime(myvme, V1290N_BASE) );
00566         sleep(1);
00567 }
00568 void v1290_SetupReadout(MVME_INTERFACE *myvme)
00569 {
00570         v1290_EnableHeader(myvme, V1290N_BASE, false);
00571         sleep(1);
00572         printf("header enable %d\n", v1290_HeaderIsEnabled(myvme, V1290N_BASE));
00573         sleep(1);
00574         printf("max hits %d\n", v1290_ReadMaxHits(myvme, V1290N_BASE));
00575         sleep(1);
00576         v1290_SetFIFOSize(myvme, V1290N_BASE, 0x6);
00577         sleep(1);
00578         printf("fifo size %d\n", v1290_ReadFIFOSize(myvme, V1290N_BASE));
00579         sleep(1);
00580         v1290_DisableAllChannels(myvme, V1290N_BASE);
00581         sleep(1);
00582         v1290_WriteEnablePattern(myvme, V1290N_BASE, 0x5);
00583         sleep(1);
00584         v1290_EnableChannel(myvme, V1290N_BASE, 0x0, false);
00585         sleep(1);
00586         printf("enable pattern %x\n", v1290_ReadEnablePattern(myvme, V1290N_BASE));
00587         v1290_EnableChannel(myvme, V1290N_BASE, 0, true);
00588 }

00590 void v1290_ContinuousRead(MVME_INTERFACE *myvme)
00591 {
00592         // Set up TDC in Continuous Storage mode
00593         /*v1290_ModuleReset(myvme, V1290N_BASE);*/
00594         /*sleep(1);*/
00595         uint16_t almost_full_level = 8;
00596         v1290_ContinuousSet(myvme, V1290N_BASE);
00597         sleep(1);
00598         v1290_SetAlmostFullLevel(myvme, V1290N_BASE, almost_full_level);
00599         sleep(1);
00600         v1290_AcqModeRead(myvme, V1290N_BASE);
00601         printf("v1290DataReady: %d\n",v1290_IsDataReady(myvme, V1290N_BASE));
00602         printf("v1290AlmostFull: %d\n",v1290_IsAlmostFull(myvme, V1290N_BASE));
00603 
00604         //  Injecting hits
00605         int i = 0;
00606         printf("injecting trigger and signals ... \n");
00607         do 
00608         {
00609                 printf("round %d ...\n", i + 1);
00610                 rpv130_Pulse(myvme,RPV130_BASE,1); // input 11
00611                 rpv130_Pulse(myvme,RPV130_BASE,3); // input 15
00612                 i++;
00613         }
00614         while (!v1290_IsAlmostFull(myvme, V1290N_BASE));
00615 
00616         printf("v1290DataReady: %d\n",v1290_IsDataReady(myvme, V1290N_BASE));
00617         printf("v1290AlmostFull: %d\n",v1290_IsAlmostFull(myvme, V1290N_BASE));
00618 
00619         // readout
00620         unsigned int buff[200];
00621         for (i=0; i<200; i++)
00622                 buff[i] = 0;
00623 
00624         // Sequential read out
00625         /*for (i=0; i<20; i++)*/
00626                 /*buff[i] = v1290_Read32(myvme,V1290N_BASE,V1290_OUT_BUFFER);*/
00627 
00628         // BLT read out
00629         int nentry;
00630         nentry = v1290_DataRead(myvme, V1290N_BASE, buff, almost_full_level + 4);
00631 
00632         // Check read data
00633         for (i = 0; i < nentry; i++) {
00634                 /*if(V1290_IS_TDC_MEASURE(buff[i]))*/
00635                 /*{*/
00636                         printf("buff[%02d], ch %02d:",i,V1290_GET_TDC_MSR_CHANNEL(buff[i]));
00637                         printf(", value: %d, ", V1290_GET_TDC_MSR_MEASURE(buff[i]));
00638                         showbits(buff[i]);
00639                 /*}*/
00640         }
00641 }

00643 void v1290_TriggerMatchingRead(MVME_INTERFACE *myvme)
00644 {
00645         /*v1290_ModuleReset(myvme, V1290N_BASE);*/
00646         sleep(1);
00647         v1290_AcqModeRead(myvme, V1290N_BASE);
00648         /*v1290_SetupTrigger(myvme);*/
00649         /*v1290_SetupTDC(myvme);*/
00650         /*sleep(1);*/
00651         /*v1290_SetupReadout(myvme);*/
00652         /*v1290_EnableBusError(myvme, V1290N_BASE, true);*/
00653         /*v1290_EnableEventFIFO(myvme, V1290N_BASE, true);*/
00654         /*v1290_EnableEmptyEvent(myvme, V1290N_BASE, true);*/
00655         /*v1290_ReadControlRegister(myvme, V1290N_BASE);*/
00656 
00657 #if 1
00658         printf("v1290DataReady: %d\n",v1290_IsDataReady(myvme, V1290N_BASE));
00659         uint16_t fifo[2];
00660         v1290_ReadEventFIFO(myvme, V1290N_BASE, fifo);
00661         printf("event cnt: %d, word cnt: %d\n", fifo[0],fifo[1]);
00662         usleep(1);
00663 
00664         printf("injecting trigger and signals ... ");
00665         rpv130_Pulse(myvme,RPV130_BASE,1); // input 11
00666         rpv130_Pulse(myvme,RPV130_BASE,3); // input 15
00667         usleep(1);
00668         printf("v1290DataReady: %d\n",v1290_IsDataReady(myvme, V1290N_BASE));
00669 
00670         printf("FIFO stat %d\n", v1290_ReadEventFIFOStatus(myvme, V1290N_BASE));
00671         v1290_ReadEventFIFO(myvme, V1290N_BASE, fifo);
00672         printf("event cnt: %d, word cnt: %d\n", fifo[0],fifo[1]);
00673         printf("event stored: %d\n", v1290_ReadEventStored(myvme, V1290N_BASE));
00674 
00675         // readout
00676         unsigned int buff[200];
00677         int i;
00678         for (i=0; i<200; i++)
00679                 buff[i] = 0;
00680 
00681         /*for (i=0; i<20; i++)*/
00682                 /*buff[i] = v1290_Read32(myvme,V1290N_BASE,V1290_OUT_BUFFER);*/
00683         v1290_DataRead(myvme, V1290N_BASE, buff, fifo[1]);
00684 
00685         for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
00686                 if(V1290_IS_TDC_MEASURE(buff[i]))
00687                 {
00688                         printf("buff[%02d], ch %02d:",i,V1290_GET_TDC_MSR_CHANNEL(buff[i]));
00689                         printf(", value: %d, ", V1290_GET_TDC_MSR_MEASURE(buff[i]));
00690                         showbits(buff[i]);
00691                 }
00692         }
00693         printf("v1290DataReady: %d\n",v1290_IsDataReady(myvme, V1290N_BASE));
00694 #endif
00695 }
